member.name: WS_SECURITY_BINDING_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: The base class for all security binding constraint structures.

member.name: WS_SECURITY_BINDING_CONSTRAINT.type
member.summary: This value depends on which type of security binding constraint that is used.

summary.para: A set of binding-specific security property constraints.
The number of elements in the propertyConstraints array.
If the array has zero elements, the propertyConstraints field may be NULL.
